duties_responsibilities.duty: Source new sales opportunities through outbound cold calls, emails, and some inbound lead follow-up.
Take responsibility for customer follow-up on cold and warm leads to further sales process.
Develop meaningful relationships with customers to encourage trust and loyalty.
Achieve monthly sales quotas and objectives.
Understand client needs and offer solutions and support.
Create and maintain a list/database of prospect clients.
Track weekly, monthly, and quarterly performance and sales metrics.
Maintain databases (Salesforce, CRM, Google, etc.) of prospective client information.
